casebody.data:
FINK
v.
GOODYEAR TIRE, et al. No. 12P09. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2009. Gina Cammarano, Raleigh, for Fink. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of January 2009 by Defendants for Temporary Stay: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of January 2009." HUDSON, J., recused.
